Reviews.Title: Phone worked well and met our needs
Reviews.Author: Tim Dinger
Reviews.Content: I needed a cheap phone for my wife for when she is out and about.  This phone worked well until she ran it through the washing machine.  I will buy another.

Reviews.Title: Not working.
Reviews.Author: Stan E
Reviews.Content: It was said to be sim unlocked phone but unfortunately, its not.I was disappointed because I cant use the phone.

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: Stefany Ventura
Reviews.Content: the cellphone is good, but, it doesn't have an FM radio app, and neither can put music on, so, it is not so good after all, the cam is good, it works ok but it wasn't't what i was expecting..

ProductInfo.Name: Samsung A197 Unlocked GSM Flip Phone with 1.37 Color Display, VGA Camera, Bluetooth, Mobile Web, SMS (with T9), IM, Email and Organizer - Black
